statements: UPSERT INTO cybersecurity_data (id, username, password, email) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'password123', 'john_doe@example.com')
UPSERT INTO cybersecurity_data (id, username, password, email) VALUES (2, 'alice_smith', 'securepass', 'alice_smith@example.com')
UPSERT INTO cybersecurity_data (id, username, password, email) VALUES (3, 'bob_jones', 'pass123', 'bob_jones@example.com')
UPSERT INTO users (id, username, email, password) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'john_doe@example.com', 'password123')
UPSERT INTO users (id, username, email, password) VALUES (2, 'jane_smith', 'jane_smith@example.com', 'securepwd456')
UPSERT INTO users (id, username, email, password) VALUES (3, 'alice_wonderland', 'alice_wonderland@example.com', 'letmein789')
UPSERT INTO users (user_id, username, email, password) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'password123') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username='john_doe'
UPSERT INTO incidents (incident_id, incident_type, description, reported_by) VALUES (1, 'Bug', 'A bug was found in the system', 1) ON CONFLICT (incident_id) DO UPDATE SET incident_type='Bug'
UPSERT INTO logs (log_id, log_type, timestamp, message, user_id) VALUES (1, 'Error', '2022-01-01 12:00:00', 'An error occurred', 1) ON CONFLICT (log_id) DO NOTHING

INSERT INTO users (username, password, email, role) VALUES ('john_doe', 'password123', 'john.doe@example.com', 'admin') ON CONFLICT (username) DO UPDATE SET password = 'new_password123', email = 'new_john.doe@example.com', role = 'user';
INSERT INTO permissions (permission_name, description) VALUES ('edit_tasks', 'Permission to edit tasks') ON CONFLICT (permission_name) DO NOTHING;
INSERT INTO roles (role_name, description) VALUES ('editor', 'Role for editing tasks') ON CONFLICT (role_name) DO UPDATE SET description = 'Role for editing content';
INSERT INTO users (id, username, password) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'password123') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username=VALUES(username), password=VALUES(password)
INSERT INTO roles (id, role_name) VALUES (1, 'admin') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE role_name=VALUES(role_name)
INSERT INTO permissions (id, permission_name) VALUES (1, 'write_access') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE permission_name=VALUES(permission_name)
